func.title: GetTaggedPlayerName

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose name to get.

func.desc: Returns the name of a player, including color markup using the player color. If the specified player number is invalid, nil is returned. Thus this function can also be used to determine whether a player of a given number exists.
func.remark: The markup color is chosen so the player name will be readable on black background. Dark player names are brightened up.

example.text: Object script for a valuable "golden crown". If it is collected by a clonk, a message is displayed in the log that draws attention to the player that collected it.
